* h00 (an out-of-plane peak)
* 4.0 (a diffraction peak angle)
* 8.1 (a diffraction peak angle)
* 12.2 (a diffraction peak angle)

Sure, here's the updated table with only the entities that clearly refer to material properties:

| --- |

The only material property mentioned in the paragraph is h00, which refers to an out-of-plane peak in the diffraction pattern of the material. The other angles mentioned in the paragraph (4.0, 8.1, 12.2) are not material properties, but rather specific values of the diffraction angles observed in the experiment.
